nsp.impl.random

Class RandomGenerator_VonMises

  • java.lang.Object
    • nsp.impl.random.RandomGenerator_VonMises
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, RandomGenerator

    public class RandomGenerator_VonMises
extends java.lang.Object
implements RandomGenerator, java.lang.Cloneable
    Number generator that implements the RandomGenerator interface, and returns pseudo-random numbers drawn from a Von Mises distribution.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomGenerator_VonMises()
      No-argument constructor
      RandomGenerator_VonMises(double mean, double k)
      Constructor that accepts parameter values to be used by the function.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RandomGenerator_VonMises clone()
      Returns a clone/copy of the instance.
      double getK()
      Retrieves the spread (analogous to variance) of the distribution
      double getMean()
      Retrieves the mean value of the distribution.
      java.lang.Number getNext()
      Returns the next pseudo-random value from the generator.
      java.lang.Number getNext(double mean, double k)
      Returns the next pseudo-random value from the generator using the provided parameters.
      void setK(double k)
      Sets the spread parameter to be used by the distribution (analogous to variance)
      void setMean(double mean)
      Sets the mean value to be used by the distribution.
